name: Ping Pong Madness
description:
It's time to bring the Ping Pong to a new dimension!

Have fun playing through three incredible levels with stunning visuals, and increasingly intense difficulties.

No goals, just have fun !. Reaches increasingly high scores and challenge your friends to improve yourself.

Ping Pong Madness is a game in constant development. And we're just starting out, your comments are very important. We want to hear your suggestions to bring this game to higher levels.
